train: wmctrl -r rear_view -b add,above ; wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk train.launch
spatial: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk train.launch
latency: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk latency.launch
latency0: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk latency.launch
latency1: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk latency.launch delayValue:=1
latency2: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk latency.launch delayValue:=2
latency3: wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk latency.launch delayValue:=3
ttc1: wmctrl -r rear_view -b add,above ; wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk ttc.launch
ttc2: wmctrl -r rear_view -b add,above ; wmctrl -r speed -b add,above ; roslaunch cognata_sdk ttc.launch ttcValue:=2
